definitions.definition: An idiosyncrasy; a slight glitch, mannerism; something unusual about the manner or style of something or someone
definitions.example: The car steers cleanly, but the gearshift has a few quirks.

definitions.definition: An acute angle dividing a molding; a groove that runs lengthwise between the upper part of a moulding and a soffit
To move with a wry jerk.
To furnish with a quirk or channel.
To use verbal tricks or quibbles
